channel.title: Comments for Walk to WordCamp Europe

item.title: Comment on Wrapping up Walk to WordCamp Europe by Jesse
item.dc:creator: Jesse
item.description: I believe Remkus said this time something like, "Nostromo! Why are you walking STOP WALKING."
item.content:encoded: I believe Remkus said this time something like, “Nostromo! Why are you walking STOP WALKING.”

item.title: Comment on Day 29 – Brandendurg an der Havel by Nico
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Marcel, next time I will prepare some more detours ;)
I wrote my own recap of this nice day: https://n1da.net/2019/06/16/sonntagsspaziergang-von-genthin-nach-brandenburg-auf-dem-walktowceu/
Looking forward to see tomorrow at the WordPress Meetup Potsdam or - latest - at WCEU in Berlin :)
Wish you all the best for the last 3 stages!
Cheers, Nico
item.content:encoded:
Marcel, next time I will prepare some more detours ðŸ˜‰

I wrote my own recap of this nice day: https://n1da.net/2019/06/16/sonntagsspaziergang-von-genthin-nach-brandenburg-auf-dem-walktowceu/

Looking forward to see tomorrow at the WordPress Meetup Potsdam or – latest – at WCEU in Berlin ðŸ™‚

Wish you all the best for the last 3 stages!

Cheers,
Nico

item.title: Comment on Day 9 – A day of rest in Bad Bentheim by Hendrik van Triest
item.dc:creator: Hendrik van Triest
item.description: Oh, Bentheim is echt mooi. Ik ben er goot geworden.
item.content:encoded:
Oh, Bentheim is echt mooi.
Ik ben er goot geworden.

item.title: Comment on Day 17 – Rest day and many thanks to Meindl by Harald en Marloes
item.dc:creator: Harald en Marloes
item.description: Hey Marcel, wat gaaf om je blogs te lezen, echt super stoer dat je dit doet, we zijn trots op je!! Zet hem op en hopelijk is je enkel gauw hersteld! Veel plezier met je ouders, groetjes van ons! Harald, Marloes en co
item.content:encoded: Hey Marcel, wat gaaf om je blogs te lezen, echt super stoer dat je dit doet, we zijn trots op je!! Zet hem op en hopelijk is je enkel gauw hersteld! Veel plezier met je ouders, groetjes van ons! Harald, Marloes en co
